name: chefConnie
0:
”Alexa, ask chef Connie what I'm doing”
”Alexa, ask chef Connie what's next for the lasagna”
”Alexa, ask chef Connie what I'm working on”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chef connie
Developer Terms of Use
des:
chef Connie will talk you through your recipes.

No more running back and forth between your stove and your cookbooks or electronics! Our voice assistant guides you through recipes—our suggestions, plus ones you import from the web or your cookbooks—answering your questions like “what am I doing?” and “what’s next for the lasagna?”.

To use the chef Connie skill you must link your device with your chef Connie account. If you do not already have a chef Connie account, please go to https://chefconnie.co and install our browser extension and start cooking today.
